entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:23 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 01:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: W 20 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries late this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 8:33 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:33 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 8:33 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
